turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about T-98 Kombat.
turn.1: What was the main battle tank of the Cold War?
turn.2: T-98 Kombat The T-98 Kombat is a wheeled armoured vehicle built by Kombat Armouring, a subsidiary of Laura Group, in St. Petersburg, Russia.
turn.4: The name (), is shorthand for "komandir batalyona" (командир батальона - battalion commander).
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The Kombat is one of the fastest armoured off-road vehicles in the world with a top speed of 180 km/h.
turn.8: There are two basic versions of the T-98 Kombat based on General Motors components, including an 8.1 litre Vortec engine, Allison transmission, and GM heavy duty suspensions.
